subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national capacity for inclusive governance and coordination of national HIV responses, and for the protection of human rights of people affected by HIV, including women and other vulnerable groups
subproject.description:
Increased institutional capacities for HIV/AIDS related research developed.
1. Capacity of NERCHA built to coordinate and monitor national and local HIV/AIDS interventions.
2. Improved managerial and administrative capacity of PLWHA and civil society organizations developed.
3. NHDR produced, launched and disseminated to make an input in decision making processes.
4. Strengthened community involvement, participation and the ownership of the response to HIV/AIDS particularly by women's groups and PLWHA.
5. Accelerated advocacy on HIV/AIDS to reduce risk behaviour.
6. National UNV scheme established to mobilize underutilized local capacity and improved delivery of services neccessary to meet the MDG targets.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Support to HIV/AIDS Response
